#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int main(){
       int T,half;
       string mains,temp1,temp2,es1,es2;
       
       cin >> T;
       
       while(T--)
       {
          cin >> mains;
          half = (mains.length()/2);
          temp1 = mains.substr(0,half); //from 1st letter to 1st half
          temp2 = mains.substr(half,half*2); //from 2nd half to last letter
          
          es1="";
          for(int i=0;i<temp1.length();i++) //reversing 1st half of the str
          es1 = temp1[i]+es1;
          
          es2="";
          for(int i=0;i<temp2.length();i++) //reversing 2nd half of the str
          es2 = temp2[i]+es2;
          
          cout << es1+es2 << endl; //join the reversed strings
          } 
          
          return 0;
          }
